heading: HB01912
0: AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE REGULATORY SYSTEM IN THE COUNTRY TO COMBAT COUNTERFEIT PHARMACEUTICAL PRODUCTS, DECLARING THE MANUFACTURE, IMPORTATION, DISTRIBUTION, SALE OR OFFER FOR SALE, OR POSSESSION OF COUNTERFEIT PHARMACEUTICAL PRODUCTS AS AN OFFENSE INVOLVING ECONOMIC SABOTAGE, PROVIDING FOR THE PROHIBITIONS AND PENALTIES FOR VIOLATIONS AND REVISING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8203 OR THE ꞌSPECIAL LAW ON COUNTERFEIT DRUGSꞌ
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2019-07-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01912
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE REGULATORY SYSTEM IN THE COUNTRY TO COMBAT COUNTERFEIT PHARMACEUTICAL PRODUCTS, DECLARING THE MANUFACTURE, IMPORTATION, DISTRIBUTION, SALE OR OFFER FOR SALE, OR POSSESSION OF COUNTERFEIT PHARMACEUTICAL PRODUCTS AS AN OFFENSE INVOLVING ECONOMIC SABOTAGE, PROVIDING FOR THE PROHIBITIONS AND PENALTIES FOR VIOLATIONS AND REVISING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8203 OR THE ꞌSPECIAL LAW ON COUNTERFEIT DRUGSꞌ
